Name: Pathmaker
About the game: Pathmaker is a puzzle game with the goal to get all of your carts from one side to the other. You'll need to cross tracks, avoid obstacles, and make sure the carts don't collide with each other. You can even change sections of track into slow paths or turbo. The levels start basic but get progressively harder - 130 levels in all. And for extra challenges, there are 3 random level generators to keep the puzzles coming. Are you up to the challenge?
